author: brett
msg: setup a simple, backwards compatible mechanism to start implementing the new plugin instantiation

author: brett
msg: move log to AbstractPlugin, out of request. Request now contains only parameters (will move to fields) and marmalade context (can move to marmalade mojo wrapper)

author: brett
msg: change the plugin execution response to be an exception instead since it only handled failures.
any returns from success will be conveyed by the request, soon to be converted into fields on the plugin. These will eventually be extracted using OGNL, but this is all post alpha-1 work
